tokens.resolved_gloss: to pull off; hence (intensively) to strip, (reflex.) to depart; by implication, to deliver, equip (for fight); present, strengthen

tokens.resolved_gloss: to denude (especially in a disgraceful sense); by implication, to exile (captives being usually stripped); figuratively, to reveal
